name: Hope (itch) (Kamatt)
description:
A game made for the Blackthornprod Game Jam,  loosely based on the theme "less is more".  In this game you control a lost soul using your voice (you need a microphone/ headphone for playing this game) (yes ,they can be used as microphones)

This is an experiment that I wanted to try, about controlling a character with audio input...

// about the theme and the relation with the game:

// I used for myself :  " the less elements i had to  make the game, more ways i have to come up with, to make an interesting game or mechanic.

In this game i used  1 level , only 1 movement  direction for the player, and only 1 way to make it move (with your voice, that it also has to be 1  monotonous sound.

// I used for the game:  "the less you break the OOOOOOOOOOO , the more you stay afloat. 

All this, and another stuff is explained in the menus of the game.
